name: Maris Bellum
description:
Maris Bellum is a card game, and is Latin for the ‘war on the ocean’.  This game is for 3 players that  battle for total control of the ocean.  Teams start with 100 health points. The goal is to get the other team to 0 health points. The first team to get to 0 points loses control of the ocean.

There are attack, defense, and surprise cards. There are 4 checkpoints throughout the game. Once you reach a multiple of 25 units of power (100, 75, 50, 25) you have to replace all your cards with completely new ones and continue playing.
